programs.program:
as principal admin password "admin" do
create principal bob "password"
create principal alice "password"
create principal eve "password"
set x = "my string"
set delegation x admin delegate -> alice
return x
***

as principal alice password "password" do
return x
***

as principal alice password "password" do
set delegation x alice read -> bob
return "exiting"
***

as principal alice password "password" do
delete delegation x alice write -> bob
return "exiting"
***
